summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring for optimal conditions.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; consider adding pH buffers if it rises further.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain below 500 ppm for optimal plant growth.
Keep temperature between 24°C and 28°C; consider cooling methods if it rises above 28°C.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.014 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 324.37 / 300.3 / 331.8 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.712 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
